attributes.action: intervene to ensure that the Norwich railway line continues to enjoy a Restaurant service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Norwich to Liverpool Street railway is a key economic link for East Anglia's largest city.  The popular railway Restaurant is under threat and we petition the Prime Minister to intervene and save the jobs of the catering teams and the rumbling stomachs of the passengers

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "intervene to ensure that the Norwich railway line continues to enjoy a Restaurant service."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18059


Prime Minister's Office
